videos.title: The Learning and Teaching Development Programme
videos.description: Prof. Eugenia NG Mee Wah - The Learning and Teaching Development Programme (LTDP) is a 7-month professional development programme designed to familiarize research postgraduate students and new teachers, who have less than 3 years of teaching experience, with the latest development in tertiary-level pedagogy and best practices.

videos.title: Plickers
videos.description: Professor Jonathan Frome - The students all learn something by talking to each other. I think it is a good way to engage with the class.

videos.title: Reacting to the Past Pedagogy
videos.description: Professor Grace CHOU - All liberal arts institutions have in common the goal of producing critical thinkers, people who are able to make informed decisions in wide variety of arenas.
